crisis.title: The Global Energy Access Crisis
crisis.text: 760 million people lack reliable electricity, while 49% of energy projects fail due to poor planning.

local_gov.title: The Problem for Local Governments
local_gov.text: Local governments are facing planning gridlock due to fragmented data, which causes high project risk and failure to reach those in need.

pain_points.text: Data Fragmentation: Information is siloed and scattered, blocking a unified view.
Subjective Prioritization: Project selection is biased, lacking objective metrics.
High Risk (49% Failure): Inefficiency drives major project delays and risk.
Inadequate Targeting: Inability to precisely locate the vulnerable, wasting resources.

opportunity.title: Polisense AI: A Global Impact Opportunity & Solution Pillars
opportunity.text: By targeting high-density communities with low energy access, Polisense.AI helps bridge the energy gap for millions, ensuring investments are directed where they are most needed.

pillars.title: 1. Integrated Data
pillars.description: Unifies geospatial, government, and web data into a single source of truth.

pillars.title: 2. AI Prioritization
pillars.description: Ranks projects on Need, Feasibility, and Impact for objective decisions.

pillars.title: 3. Decision Support
pillars.description: Interactive dashboards and collaboration tools to accelerate deployment.

footer.results: Proven Results: Up to 80% reduction in project delays and 2.8x better budget targeting accuracy.
